definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Tian1 zhu3 jiao4 Ai4 guo2 hui4

sentences.english: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒向玛利亚祈祷，并把她看作仲裁者。

sentences.english: Some practices in the China Church are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 中国天主教会里面有一些做法让人实在看不懂。

sentences.english: Critics argue this stunt is hostile to the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 批语家指出这样的惊人表演是对天主教堂的不敬重。

sentences.english: Public celebration of the Eucharist in the Roman Catholic Church and some Protestant churches.
sentences.chinese: 十九世纪从罗马天主教分离出来的天主教派。

sentences.english: Public celebration of the Eucharist in the Roman Catholic Church and some Protestant churches.
sentences.chinese: 十九世纪从罗马天主教分离出来的天主教派。

sentences.english: Catholics are agnostic to the Protestant creeds.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒对于新教教义来说，是不可知论者。

sentences.english: Ticki, I sometimes think you just became a catholic to marry me.
sentences.chinese: 蒂奇，有时候我想，你皈依天主教只是为了同我结婚。

sentences.english: The Gunpowder Plot of 1605 was the most famous of the Catholic conspiracies.
sentences.chinese: 1605年的火药阴谋案是最著名的天主教阴谋。

sentences.english: The use of Catholic saints also bespeaks a syncretism of beliefs, he notes.
sentences.chinese: 就连天主教圣人也预言到了这种信仰融合。

sentences.english: Critics say he mishandled the sex-abuse scandal that has rocked the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 也有人认为他对震撼罗马天主教会的性丑闻处理不当。

sentences.english: The most famous of the Catholic compiracies was the Gunpowder plot of 1605.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的天主教阴谋是1605年的火药阴谋案。

sentences.english: Catechumen will freely decide if he or she wants to be baptized and become a member of the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 慕道者最终应自由的选择是否要领洗加入天主教会。

sentences.english: But some Chinese Catholics still shun it and, risking punishment, worship “underground”.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，很多中国天主教徒仍冒险参加地下教会。

sentences.english: He has converted from Buddhism to Catholicism.
sentences.chinese: 他已放弃佛教改信天主教了。

sentences.english: And just 10% of these 51% people go to church.
sentences.chinese: 并且这51%的天主教徒中只有一成去教堂。

definition: the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican
religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
